http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv-community.gif http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif WM-TECHNICAL List WM-TECHNICAL List Archives https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=WM-TECHNICAL&v=ATOM1.0
This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=WM-TECHNICAL.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-02-24T19:45:28Z Jason Curtis 2015-02-24T19:45:18+00:00 2015-02-24T19:45:18+00:00 The future of this list https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=WM-TECHNICAL;8ea08aa9.1502 Dear Colleagues,<br><br>As you may be aware, during the autumn of 2014, Jisc undertook a reshaping process, bringing all its customer service functions in-house, to provide a more joined up, consistent service. Our commitment to ensuring you and your colleagues receive advice, solutions and support to make digital technology work for your organisation, learners and staff is undimmed and we hope our new structure will help improve and strengthen connections with you, the people we are here to support. [...] Russell Bevan 2015-02-19T14:29:30+00:00 2015-02-19T14:29:30+00:00 Touch Screen Smart board Alternatives https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=WM-TECHNICAL;8c4f5371.1502 Dear All,<br><br>I've just had a demonstration of a 65" G-Touch running Genee Spark software http://www.interactive-education.co.uk/product/interactive-screen/g-touch-deluxe/<br><br>It was very impressive and so much more functionality from our normal smartboards.<br><br>Have you had any experience of these devices compared to Smart touch screen devices ?<br><br>If you have deployed them, how have staff reacted to them not being the same as a smartboard ? [...] Matt Ewens 2015-02-18T15:05:29+00:00 2015-02-18T15:05:29+00:00 Digifest: bringing people together from across UK education and research, through digital technology https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=WM-TECHNICAL;4abf385a.1502 Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=WM-TECHNICAL;4abf385a.1502">Digifest: bringing people together from across UK education and research, through digital technology </a> Matt Ewens 2015-02-17T10:11:05+00:00 2015-02-17T10:11:05+00:00 Change to list name https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=WM-TECHNICAL;a2b4ea92.1502 Hello,<br><br>This is just a short message to inform you that we are making a change to this list name and the associated email account.<br><br>Shortly the list will be called 'WM-TECHNICAL@JISCMAIL.AC.UK'<br><br>You do not need to take any action.<br><br>Many thanks<br><br>Matt Ewens<br>Community Engagement Officer, South West & Midlands<br><br>M: 07468724003<br>Skype: jiscmatt<br><br>One Castlepark, Tower Hill, Bristol. BS2 0JA [...] Russell Bevan 2014-12-01T16:36:04+00:00 2014-12-01T16:36:04+00:00 Options when QL/F support ends https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=WM-TECHNICAL;969b9f9a.1412 Dear All,<br><br>With the ending of support for QL/F we are considering our options.<br><br>For those of us running QL/F from Unit4 for finance, are any of you thinking of changing to a different system or are you migrating over to "Agresso-Finance".<br><br>For those of you not using Unit4 QL/F, what finance system do you run instead ? [...] Romero, Colleen 2014-11-18T10:45:33+00:00 2014-11-18T10:45:33+00:00 IPV6 Training https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=WM-TECHNICAL;5451364.1411 You might be interested to know that there are still places on this upcoming course.<br><br>IPv6 Fundamentals<br>25 November, Bristol<br>The aim of this course is to provide a basic introduction to IPv6. This will include the evolution of IPv6, the differences between the IPv6 and IPv4 protocols. IPv6 address allocations are explained in the context of the Janet network, along with information on the deployment of IPv6, how to manage and monitor IPv6 traffic and concluding with an implementation case study.<br>A full course description is available at https://www.ja.net/training/schedule-and-booking [...] Romero, Colleen 2014-10-07T10:06:04+00:00 2014-10-07T10:06:04+00:00 technical courses in the south west https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=WM-TECHNICAL;3399324e.1410 The RSC Southwest are offering the following 3-day courses, all are priced at \ufffd\ufffd150 per person:<br><br>\ufffd\ufffd Microsoft Windows Server 2012 Administration<br><br>\ufffd\ufffd Microsoft Exchange Server 2013 Administration<br><br>\ufffd\ufffd Microsoft SCCM and SCVMM<br><br>\ufffd\ufffd InfoPath Forms in SharePoint<br><br>\ufffd\ufffd Using Powershell to Manage AD and Office 365<br><br>More information and booking forms can be found on the RSC Southwest event page<http://jiscevents.force.com/E/EventsMainPage?srvc=JISC%20RSC%20South%20West>.<br>Colleen Romero | eLearning Advisor - Technical Infrastructure | Jisc RSC West Midlands [...] Romero, Colleen 2014-07-01T09:11:43+00:00 2014-07-01T09:11:43+00:00 Open-source web filtering https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=WM-TECHNICAL;9e143a9e.1407 Can anyone recommend an open-source web filtering system for use within an FE College?<br><br>Colleen Romero | eLearning Advisor - Technical Infrastructure | Jisc RSC West Midlands<br><br>Tel: 01902 518978 | Mobile: 07980 982738 | Web: www.jiscrsc.ac.uk<http://www.jiscrsc.ac.uk/><br><br>Jisc RSC West Midlands is a service hosted by the University of Wolverhampton<br>[https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/lycazIHVCXkUvHNtG8P25FUH3VyIggCyRJX8LuGD4G8nLLhD92aXehdOPjz83-FVvoShE0GeEPqmYhj-4GwiCyEKuqRv_T6gLKoxKvwlwnMl6go_rHI]<https://twitter.com/rscwm>[https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/q8eNSDnoDTxHf8zBkvULloo7slnaLEqmsZZdauCmGFUqpTtMbCRl6MohSPNpLYifMhDg_6zdcmGvZzlWjzosemvikumrU2b-r6noLpksd26uV-KBaPU]<http://www.facebook.com/pages/JISC-RSC-West-Midlands/204452866238113><br><br>This email with any attachment, is for the exclusive and confidential use of the addressee(s) and may contain legally privileged information. If you receive this email in error, please visit http://www.wlv.ac.uk/ITS-disclaimer.<br>Please consider the environment before printing this email. [...]
